page.title: 10Industry
page.content: {Industry}in our area Some of the industries which we have seen are{:Velindre}tinplating industry;J.R.Steels;Honda/SAAB garage;Silconix;shops in Morriston;small shops like hairdressers and newsagents in Cwmrhydyceirw and Ynysforgan. Some recently closed places include the{quarry}at Cwmrhydyceirw and the CO-OP. at Parc Gwernfadog. The{Hospital}employs a lot of people,some of the porters there are redundant steel workers. Local schools and hotels,such as the Gwernfadog hotel,also employ people. Quite a few people have vans parked outside their houses-e.g.video sales vans or driving school cars. We are within easy reach of most areas,so many of us travel to outlying areas to do our work.
